Ruben, \w Simeon|strong="H8095"\w*, \w Levi|strong="H3878"\w*, Juda,

\w Dan|strong="H1835"\w*, \w and|strong="H1410"\w* Nephtali, \w Gad|strong="H1410"\w* \w and|strong="H1410"\w* Aser.

\w And|strong="H4714"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w souls|strong="H5315"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w Jacobâ€™s|strong="H3290"\w* \w thigh|strong="H3409"\w*, \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w seventy|strong="H7657"\w*: \w but|strong="H1961"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H5315"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*.

\w In|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* mean time \w there|strong="H3045"\w* \w arose|strong="H6965"\w* \w a|strong="H0834"\w* \w new|strong="H2319"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w knew|strong="H3045"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w*:

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H4480"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w his|strong="H4480"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*: \w Behold|strong="H2009"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w are|strong="H3478"\w* \w numerous|strong="H7227"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w stronger|strong="H6099"\w* \w than|strong="H4480"\w* we.

\w Come|strong="H1961"\w*, \w let|strong="H1961"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w* \w wisely|strong="H2449"\w* oppress \w them|strong="H5921"\w*, \w lest|strong="H6435"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w multiply|strong="H7235"\w*: \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w if|strong="H3588"\w* \w any|strong="H4480"\w* \w war|strong="H4421"\w* \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* \w rise|strong="H5927"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w*, \w join|strong="H3254"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w our|strong="H5921"\w* \w enemies|strong="H8130"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w having|strong="H1961"\w* overcome \w us|strong="H5921"\w*, \w depart|strong="H5927"\w* \w out|strong="H4480"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="H4616"\w* \w he|strong="H0853"\w* \w set|strong="H7760"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* masters \w of|strong="H8269"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w works|strong="H5921"\w*, \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w afflict|strong="H6031"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w burdens|strong="H5450"\w*, \w and|strong="H6547"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w built|strong="H1129"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* Pharao \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \w of|strong="H8269"\w* tabernacles, Phithom \w and|strong="H6547"\w* Ramesses.

\w But|strong="H3651"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w more|strong="H3651"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w oppressed|strong="H6031"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w*, \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w more|strong="H3651"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w were|strong="H0834"\w* \w multiplied|strong="H7235"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w increased|strong="H6555"\w*:

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Egyptians|strong="H4713"\w* hated \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w afflicted|strong="H1121"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* mocked \w them|strong="H0853"\w*:

\w And|strong="H7704"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w made|strong="H4843"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w life|strong="H2416"\w* \w bitter|strong="H4843"\w* \w with|strong="H3605"\w* \w hard|strong="H7186"\w* \w works|strong="H5647"\w* \w in|strong="H5656"\w* clay, \w and|strong="H7704"\w* \w brick|strong="H3843"\w*, \w and|strong="H7704"\w* \w with|strong="H3605"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* manner \w of|strong="H7704"\w* \w service|strong="H5656"\w*, wherewith \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w were|strong="H0834"\w* overcharged \w in|strong="H5656"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w works|strong="H5647"\w* \w of|strong="H7704"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* earth.

\w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* \w spoke|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w midwives|strong="H3205"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Hebrews|strong="H5680"\w*: \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w whom|strong="H0834"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w was|strong="H8034"\w* \w called|strong="H0559"\w* Sephora, \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w other|strong="H0259"\w* Phua,

Commanding \w them|strong="H0853"\w*: \w When|strong="H7200"\w* \w you|strong="H0518"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w do|strong="H0518"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* office \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w midwives|strong="H3205"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Hebrew|strong="H5680"\w* \w women|strong="H1323"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* time \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w delivery|strong="H3205"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* come: \w if|strong="H0518"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w be|strong="H4191"\w* \w a|strong="H3205"\w* \w man|strong="H1121"\w* \w child|strong="H1121"\w*, \w kill|strong="H4191"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w*: \w if|strong="H0518"\w* \w a|strong="H3205"\w* \w woman|strong="H1323"\w*, \w keep|strong="H7200"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w alive|strong="H7200"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w midwives|strong="H3205"\w* \w feared|strong="H3372"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* \w had|strong="H0834"\w* \w commanded|strong="H1696"\w*, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* saved \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w men|strong="H3206"\w* \w children|strong="H3206"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w for|strong="H7121"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w What|strong="H1697"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w that|strong="H1697"\w* \w you|strong="H6213"\w* meant \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w*, \w that|strong="H1697"\w* \w you|strong="H6213"\w* \w would|strong="H0559"\w* save \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w men|strong="H3206"\w* \w children|strong="H3206"\w*?

\w They|strong="H3588"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*: \w The|strong="H0559"\w* \w Hebrew|strong="H5680"\w* \w women|strong="H0802"\w* \w are|strong="H0802"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w as|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Egyptian|strong="H4713"\w* \w women|strong="H0802"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* themselves \w are|strong="H0802"\w* skillful \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* office \w of|strong="H3205"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w midwife|strong="H3205"\w*; \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H0802"\w* \w delivered|strong="H3205"\w* \w before|strong="H2962"\w* \w we|strong="H3588"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*.

Therefore \w God|strong="H0430"\w* dealt \w well|strong="H3190"\w* \w with|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H3205"\w* \w midwives|strong="H3205"\w*: \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H3205"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w multiplied|strong="H7235"\w* \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w grew|strong="H7235"\w* \w exceedingly|strong="H3966"\w* \w strong|strong="H6105"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0430"\w* \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w midwives|strong="H3205"\w* \w feared|strong="H3372"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w built|strong="H6213"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w houses|strong="H1004"\w*.

Pharao therefore \w charged|strong="H6680"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Whatsoever|strong="H3605"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w be|strong="H1121"\w* \w born|strong="H3209"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w male|strong="H1121"\w* sex, ye \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w cast|strong="H7993"\w* \w into|strong="H7993"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w river|strong="H2975"\w*: \w whatsoever|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w female|strong="H1323"\w*, ye \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* save \w alive|strong="H2421"\w*.
